{"id":938187854,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1682219087,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/938187854/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Number of Operations to Make All Array Elements Equal to 1","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int gcd(int a, int b) {\n        if (b == 0) {\n            return a;\n        }\n        return gcd(b, a % b);\n    }\n\n    int minOperations(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int n = nums.size();\n        int operations = 0;\n\n        for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {\n            int gcd_val = gcd(nums[i], nums[i + 1]);\n            if (gcd_val > 1) {\n                // If the gcd of nums[i] and nums[i + 1] is greater than 1,\n                // replace either nums[i] or nums[i + 1] with the gcd value\n                nums[i + 1] = gcd_val;\n                operations++;\n            }\n        }\n\n        // Check if all elements are equal to 1 after the operations\n        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            if (nums[i] != 1) {\n                return -1;\n            }\n        }\n\n        return operations;\n    }\n\n};\n\n\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-number-of-operations-to-make-all-array-elements-equal-to-1","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
